settings.custom_liquid:
<style>
  .klaviyo-form-VvgsSY {
    background-color: #ff69b4;
    padding: 20px;
    width: 600px;
    height: 600px;
  }
  .klaviyo-form-VvgsSY label {
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  .klaviyo-form-VvgsSY input[type="email"] {
    padding: 10px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    border: none;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    width: 100%;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  .klaviyo-form-VvgsSY button[type="submit"] {
    background-color: #fff;
    color: #ff69b4;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    border: none;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  .klaviyo-form-VvgsSY button[type="submit"]:hover {
    background-color: #fff;
    color: #ff1493;
  }
</style>

<form action="#" class="klaviyo-form-VvgsSY">
